body_html: @ebrevdo , I'm not sure I understand. Yes, tuple are immutable, so they cannot be modified in place. A friend told me that he had no problems creating new LSTMStateTuples, so I'll spend today checking if there's some other problem with my code.

body: @ebrevdo , I'm not sure I understand. Yes, tuple are immutable, so they cannot be modified in place. A friend told me that he had no problems creating new `LSTMStateTuple`s, so I'll spend today checking if there's some other problem with my code.
